home.heroTagline: Software Developer with a primary interest in backend development. I work with Java and Spring Boot while exploring frontend technologies to build complete digital products.

description: I come from the tourism industry and transitioned into software development, where I strengthened my communication skills and developed a global mindset by working in English, Spanish, and French.
Today, my primary interest is backend development, with a focus on clean architecture, maintainability, and understanding how systems work beyond simply making them function.

items.title: Personal Portfolio
description: - Developed a multilingual portfolio using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind.
- Implemented dark and light themes with clean state management.
- Designed a responsive and accessible interface for multiple devices.
- Structured the project with reusable components and scalable architecture.

items.title: MVP Animal Shelter
description: - Developed a scalable, multilingual MVP using React, JavaScript, and Tailwind.
- Enhanced accessibility and optimized layouts across devices.
- Created an intuitive user flow that simplifies the adoption process.
- Organized the project with clean components and clear architecture.

items.title: Personal Portfolio
items.description: This project serves as both my portfolio and a practical exercise in building a structured, accessible single-page application (SPA), blending clean code organization with a cartoon-inspired, retro visual style.

items.title: Animal Shelter MVP (Web)
items.description: A web-based MVP created to help an animal shelter increase adoption opportunities through a clear, accessible, and user-friendly interface, with a structure prepared for future scalability.
